info.title: ModelServer
info.description: The ModelServer is a service for accessing subsets of macromolecular model data.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Assembly name.

parameters.name: model_nums
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of model ids (i.e. 1,2). If set, only include atoms with the corresponding '_atom_site.pdbx_PDB_model_num' field.

parameters.name: encoding
parameters.description: Determines the output encoding (text based 'CIF' or binary 'BCIF'). Ligands can also be exported as 'SDF', 'MOL', or 'MOL2'.

parameters.name: copy_all_categories
parameters.description: If true, copy all categories from the input file.

parameters.name: data_source
parameters.description: Allows to control how the provided data source ID maps to input file (as specified by the server instance config).

parameters.name: transform
parameters.description: Transformation to apply to coordinates in '_atom_site'. Accepts a 4x4 transformation matrix, provided as array of 16 float values.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: If true, browser will download text files.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Controls the filename for downloaded files. Will force download if specified.

get.summary: Identifies all residues within the given radius from the source residue. Takes crystal symmetry into account.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Value in Angstroms.

parameters.name: assembly_name
parameters.description: Assembly name. If none is provided, crystal symmetry (where available) or deposited model is used.

parameters.name: model_nums
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of model ids (i.e. 1,2). If set, only include atoms with the corresponding '_atom_site.pdbx_PDB_model_num' field.

parameters.name: encoding
parameters.description: Determines the output encoding (text based 'CIF' or binary 'BCIF'). Ligands can also be exported as 'SDF', 'MOL', or 'MOL2'.

parameters.name: copy_all_categories
parameters.description: If true, copy all categories from the input file.

parameters.name: data_source
parameters.description: Allows to control how the provided data source ID maps to input file (as specified by the server instance config).

parameters.name: transform
parameters.description: Transformation to apply to coordinates in '_atom_site'. Accepts a 4x4 transformation matrix, provided as array of 16 float values.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: If true, browser will download text files.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Controls the filename for downloaded files. Will force download if specified.

200.description: Identifies all residues within the given radius from the source residue. Takes crystal symmetry into account.

get.summary: Identifies (complete) ligands within the given radius from the source atom set. Takes crystal symmetry into account.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Value in Angstroms.

parameters.name: assembly_name
parameters.description: Assembly name. If none is provided, crystal symmetry (where available) or deposited model is used.

parameters.name: model_nums
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of model ids (i.e. 1,2). If set, only include atoms with the corresponding '_atom_site.pdbx_PDB_model_num' field.

parameters.name: encoding
parameters.description: Determines the output encoding (text based 'CIF' or binary 'BCIF'). Ligands can also be exported as 'SDF', 'MOL', or 'MOL2'.

parameters.name: copy_all_categories
parameters.description: If true, copy all categories from the input file.

parameters.name: data_source
parameters.description: Allows to control how the provided data source ID maps to input file (as specified by the server instance config).

parameters.name: transform
parameters.description: Transformation to apply to coordinates in '_atom_site'. Accepts a 4x4 transformation matrix, provided as array of 16 float values.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: If true, browser will download text files.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Controls the filename for downloaded files. Will force download if specified.

200.description: Identifies (complete) ligands within the given radius from the source atom set. Takes crystal symmetry into account.

get.summary: Executes multiple queries at the same time and writes them as separate data blocks.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: URI encoded JSON object with the query definiton.

200.description: Separate CIF data blocks with the result

post.summary: Executes multiple queries at the same time and writes them as separate data blocks.

200.description: Separate CIF data blocks with the result
